name: LD40 - Heavy Shipping
description:
This game was made for the 40th edition of the Ludum Dare, in 48h, the theme was "The more you have, the worse it is".

You control a truck and you have to ship crates to delivery points.

While on the road, crates are falling, if you pick them on your truck, your truck will become heavier. If your truck becomes too heavy, the bridge on which you are driving will break and you will lose.
